title: Anaamika Lyrics mouna guru songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Ranjith, Rahul Nambiar, Sam, MLR Karthikeyan
Song: Anaamika
Lyrics: Karky
MOvie: Mouna Guru
Music: Thaman S

Hey anaamika hey anaamika
adimanaveligalil anaamika
Hey anaamika hey anaamika
alaiyena alaindhidum anaamika

Hey anaamika hey anaamika
adai mazhai kudai yena anaamika
hey anaamika hey anaamika
araiyinil piraiyena anaamika

En idhaya thisaimaani,kaatuginra thisaiyil ne
ennavenru avathaani,kaadhal thaana?
Un vizhiyil vaazhvenaa, Un nizhalil veelvena
kelviketkum nenjodu, kaadhal thaana?

Hey hey un arugile
nodigalin idaiveli perugida kandaen
hey hey un arugile
puthu oru uravinai arumbidak kandaen
hey hey un arugile
unai unai neeye virumbidak kandaen
oh oh en kanavile
or irudhaya peyarchiyai kandaene (hey anaamika .....)

En idhaya thisaimaani, kaatuginra thisaiyil ne
ennavenru avathaani, kaadhal thaana?

Yaarodum kaana ondrai, yen unnil naanum kandaen
Hey un udalmozhi, kadhal mozhiyuthe!

Uyirodu yeno inru, vannangalin kooda kanden
Hey un ethiroli, nenjil pathiyuthe

Dhinasari kanavathan unavena
unaitharum ninaivugal thekkugiren!
hey un araikurai uraigalai karaiyumun
uraisirai araigalil pootugiren!

Hey hey un arugile
unaiunai neeye virumbidak kandaen
oh oh en kanavile
or irudhayapeyarchiyai kandaen

Hey anaamika hey anaamika
adimanaveligalil anaamika
Hey anaamika hey anaamika
alaiyena alaindhidum anaamika

Hey anaamika hey anaamika
thanna nana nan na na..
Hey anaamika hey anaamika
kaadhal thaana
